title: Explanation: The term "tolerated structure" means structure used for residential or non-residential purpose and existing prior to 17th April 1964 or 1st April 1962 respectively or date as decided by Govt
clause_text: Explanation: The term "tolerated structure" means structure used for residential or non-residential purpose and existing prior to 17th April 1964 or 1st April 1962 respectively or date as decided by Govt.
